spec_data.Name: copr-frontend-fedora
spec_data.Description:
Template files for copr-frontend (basically colors, logo, etc.).  This package is
designed to be replaced - build your replacement package against copr-frontend-devel
to produce compatible {name}-flavor package, then use man dnf.conf(5) 'priority'
option to prioritize your package against the default package we provide.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 27 Sep 2017 05:03:34 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
